name: Story of Heterosexuality
summary:
An artist's abstract attempt to articulate the experience of heterosexuality.

A segment from their artist statement: "What is heterosexuality? A preference? A biological trait? An orientation? A style of life? A philosophy? In my attempt to understand it, I have decided to make this game: Story of Heterosexuality. In so doing, I also wanted to feel what it is like to be a heterosexual and experience their struggles so as to become more empathetic with them, which makes this an 'empathy game'."
